prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Reed, Guitar, Organ, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:

This piece of music features Bass, Reed, Guitar, Organ, and Piano, but no Drums.

Style 2:

This song is composed of Bass, Reed, Guitar, Organ, and Piano, but without Drums.

Style 3:

This composition is made up of Bass, Reed, Guitar, Organ, and Piano, omitting Drums.
